StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetPersonbyLastNameFW]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@LastName as varchar(20), @Name as varchar(60), @PersonID as int AS
SELECT TOP 50 P.PERSON_ID, NWA.NWA_ID, CASE CS.STATUS_TYPE WHEN 'E' THEN (SELECT C.CONTRACT_ID FROM CONTRACT C WHERE C.NWA_ID = NWA.NWA_ID) WHEN 'O' THEN (SELECT OC.CONTRACT_ID FROM OFFICER_CONTRACT OC WHERE OC.NWA_ID = NWA.NWA_ID) END AS CONTRACT_ID, COALESCE(RTRIM(LTRIM(P.LAST_NAME)) + ', ', SPACE(0)) + COALESCE(RTRIM(LTRIM(P.FIRST_NAME)) + SPACE(1), SPACE(0)) + COALESCE(LEFT(P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, 1), SPACE(0)) AS NAME, CONVERT(CHAR(9), P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER) AS SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, COALESCE(RS.NAME, RSS.SHORT_NAME, SPACE(0)) AS RS, RSS.NAME AS RSS, SD.STATUS_DESCRIPTION, SD.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION, CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), CS.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE, 106) AS STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE, CS.STATUS_TYPE, CS.DISPOSITION_CODE, CS.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE, --- CHECK TO SEE IF THERE IS A MARINE RECORD FOR THIS PERSON CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MARINE M WHERE M.MARINE_ID = P.PERSON_ID) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS MARINE, CS.STATUS_CODE FROM PERSON P INNER JOIN NWA ON (P.PERSON_ID = NWA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND P.LAST_NAME = @LastName AND P.PERSON_ID != @PersonID AND COALESCE(RTRIM(LTRIM(P.LAST_NAME)) + ', ', SPACE(0)) + COALESCE(RTRIM(LTRIM(P.FIRST_NAME)) + SPACE(1), SPACE(0)) + COALESCE(LEFT(P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, 1), SPACE(0)) >= @Name) INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RSS ON NWA.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = RSS.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_STATUS CS ON (NWA.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID AND CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = dbo.GetMaxStatusID(CS.NWA_ID)) INNER JOIN STATUS_DISPOSITION SD ON (CS.STATUS_TYPE = SD.STATUS_TYPE AND CS.STATUS_CODE = SD.STATUS_CODE AND CS.DISPOSITION_CODE = SD.DISPOSITION_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM ON RSS.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RS ON OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = RS.ORGANIZATION_ID ORDER BY P.FIRST_NAME ASC, P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME ASC, P.PERSON_ID ASC, CS.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC, CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID DESC
